document.id: City of American Canyon, Cal., Ord. No. 2000-10
document.heading: AN ORDINANCE OF THE CITY COUNCIL OF THE CITY OF AMERICAN CANYON AMENDING AND RE-FORMATTING THOSE PORTIONS OF THE ZONING ORDINANCE APPLICABLE TO COMMERCIAL DISTRICTS INTO A NEW CHAPTER 19.11, COMMERCIAL DISTRICTS, AND AMENDING THE ZONING MAP TO DELETE THE HIGH DENSITY RESIDENTIAL DESIGNATION ON HIGHWAY 29; DELETING THE MU-MIXED USE DESIGNATION AND DESIGNATING THOSE PROPERTIES TO CC-COMMUNITY COMMERCIAL
